title: 宝塚記念の後に・節目に立ちて

text.jpText:
メジロアルダンはイナリワンとの激闘を経て、
観客たちの自分に対する評価が着実に
変わりつつあることを実感する。
text.enText:
After the fierce battle with Inari 
One, Mejiro Ardan realized that the 
audience's opinion of her was steadily 
changing. the audience's evaluation 
of her was steadily changing.

text.jpText:
そして、激闘を彩ったサクラチヨノオーと
ヤエノムテキという愛すべきライバルと、
互いの健闘を称え合うのだった。
text.enText:
And with their beloved rivals, Sakura Chiono 
O and Yaenomteki, who had colored the fierce 
battle, they praised each other's good fight. 
They praised each other's good fight.

text.jpText:
翌日、メジロアルダンはオグリキャップへの
挑戦を目標にしたいと表明。“今”の自分が
彼女に通用するかを試したいと心持を明かす。
text.enText:
The next day, Mejiro Aldan announced that her 
goal was to challenge Oguri Cap. She said she 
wanted to test her "current" self to see if 
she could compete with her. She revealed that 
she would like to test herself to see if she 
can compete with her "now".

text.jpText:
オグリキャップが出走する『天皇賞（秋）』
を大目標に据え、その前哨戦として
『毎日王冠』を目指し歩み始めるのであった。
text.enText:
She set her sights on the "Tennou-sho 
(Autumn)," in which Oguri Cap would run, as 
her major goal. The first race of the season 
was the "Mainichi-Oukan (Mainichi Crown)".
